00007    void SceSlowReadoutModBlock::setTypes() {
00008     //define the doubles
00009     _theDblTypes.clear();
00010     _theDblTypes["CMBTEMPERATURES"] = std::make_pair<int, std::vector<double>* > (kIntSroModPosCmbTemps, &_cmbTemperatures);
00011     _theDblTypes["CMBVOLTAGES"] = std::make_pair<int, std::vector<double>* > (kIntSroModPosCmbVolts, &_cmbVoltages);
00012     _theDblTypes["HBABVOLTAGES"] = std::make_pair<int, std::vector<double>* > (kIntSroModPosHbabVolts, &_hbabVoltages);
00013     _theDblTypes["HBABCURRENTS"] = std::make_pair<int, std::vector<double>* > (kIntSceSroModPosHbabCurs, &_hbabCurrents);
00014 
00015     _startOfDoubles=kIntSceSroModDblValues;
00016 
00017     //define the ints 
00018     _theIntTypes.clear();
00019      _startOfInts=kIntSceSroModIntValues;
00020 
00021     //define the floats
00022     _theIntTypes.clear();
00023      _startOfFloats=kIntSceSroModIntValues;
00024 
00025   }

00032   void SceSlowReadoutModBlock::print(std::ostream& os) {
00033     //prepare the results
00034     prepareOutputVecs();    
00035 
00036     os << "Sce SlowReadout Module Data" << std::endl;
00037     os << "Module Number: " << getModuleNumber() << std::endl;
00038     os << "Time Stamp: " << getTimeStamp().getDateString() << std::endl;
00039     os << "Led Setting: " << std::hex << "hex: " << getLedSetting() << " " << std::dec; 
00040     to_binary_bitops(getLedSetting());
00041     os << "CMB Width: " <<  getCmbWidth() << std::endl;
00042     os << "CMB Height: " << getCmbHeight() << std::endl;
00043     os << "*** CMB Temperatures: ***" << std::endl;
00044   
00045     //Print the cmb temperatures
00046     int icmbtemps(0);
00047     std::vector<double> cmbTemperatures(getCmbTemperatures());
00048     for(std::vector<double>::iterator vec_iter = cmbTemperatures.begin(); vec_iter !=
00049           cmbTemperatures.end(); vec_iter++) {
00050       if(icmbtemps == 0) os << "CMB Temperature lower: " << (*vec_iter) << " C" << std::endl;
00051       if(icmbtemps == 1) os << "CMB Temperature upper: " << (*vec_iter) << " C" << std::endl;
00052       icmbtemps++;
00053     }
00054 
00055 
00056     os << "*** CMB Voltages: ****" << std::endl;
00057     //Print the cmb voltages
00058     int icmbvolts(0);
00059     std::vector<double> cmbVoltages(getCmbVoltages());
00060     for(std::vector<double>::iterator vec_iter = cmbVoltages.begin(); vec_iter !=
00061           cmbVoltages.end(); vec_iter++) {
00062       if(icmbvolts==0) os << "CMB calib U041: " << (*vec_iter) << " V" << std::endl;
00063       if(icmbvolts==1) os << "CMB 12V power: " << (*vec_iter) << " V" << std::endl;
00064       if(icmbvolts==2) os << "CMB 1.235V: " << (*vec_iter) << " V" << std::endl;
00065       if(icmbvolts==3) os << "CMB VLDA upper: " << (*vec_iter) << " V" << std::endl;
00066       if(icmbvolts==4) os << "CMB VLDB upper: " << (*vec_iter) << " V" << std::endl;
00067       if(icmbvolts==5) os << "CMB VLDC upper: " << (*vec_iter) << " V" << std::endl;
00068       if(icmbvolts==6) os << "CMB VLDD lower: " << (*vec_iter) << " V" << std::endl;
00069       if(icmbvolts==7) os << "CMB 10 V bias: " << (*vec_iter) << " V" << std::endl;
00070       if(icmbvolts==8) os << "CMB calib U051 voltage: " << (*vec_iter) << " V" << std::endl;
00071       if(icmbvolts > 8)  os << "CMB Voltage UNKNOWN TYPE [" << icmbvolts+1 << "]: " << (*vec_iter) << " C" << std::endl;
00072       icmbvolts++;
00073     }
00074 
00075 
00076     os << "*** HBAB Voltages and Currents: ***" << std::endl;
00077     //Print the hbab voltages/currents values
00078     //int ihbabvolts(0);
00079     std::vector<double> hbabVoltages(getHbabVoltages());
00080     std::vector<double> hbabCurrents(getHbabCurrents());
00081     if(hbabVoltages.size() == hbabCurrents.size()) {
00082     std::vector<double>::iterator veccur_iter=hbabCurrents.begin();
00083       for(std::vector<double>::iterator vecvol_iter = hbabVoltages.begin(); vecvol_iter != hbabVoltages.end(); vecvol_iter++, veccur_iter++) {
00084         os << "HBAB SCE HV voltage: " << (*vecvol_iter) << " V" << std::endl;
00085         os << "HBAB SCE HV voltage: " << (*veccur_iter) << " A" << std::endl;    
00086       }
00087     } else {
00088       os << "WARNING - Number of measured HBAB Currents does not correspond to number of measured HBAB Voltages!!!" << std::endl;
00089       os << "Number of measured HBAB Currents is: " << hbabCurrents.size() << std::endl;
00090       os << "Number of measured HBAB Voltages is: " << hbabVoltages.size() << std::endl;
00091     }
00092   }
00093 }
